0.text: Innate: Whenever an enemy champion dies while Lissandra is nearby, she spawns a Frozen Thrall from their corpse. Frozen Thralls are  invulnerable and  untargetable ice spirits that  slow all nearby enemies by 25% and gain  bonus movement speed that increases over their lifespan. They will chase nearby  visible enemies for 4 seconds, prioritizing  champions, after which they shatter to deal 120 − 520 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
Active: Lissandra launches a shard of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The first target hit is  slowed for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: If Ice Shard hits an enemy, it will shatter, increasing its width and maximum range.

0.text: Active: Lissandra freezes nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and  rooting them for a duration.

Active: Lissandra sends a claw of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies it passes through, decelerating over 1.25 seconds. Glacial Path can be recast after 0.5 seconds while the claw is active.

1.text: Recast: Lissandra consumes the claw and  blinks to its current location.

0.text: Active: Lissandra can cast Frozen Tomb on herself or a target enemy champion.

1.text: Enemy Cast: Lissandra freezes the target enemy champion,  knocking them down and  stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

2.text: Self Cast: Lissandra instantly entombs herself, placing herself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds while  healing herself over the duration, which is increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health) at time of cast.

3.text: Frozen Tomb creates a field of ice that spreads out from the target over 1.5 seconds and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies and  slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

Self Cast: Lissandra instantly entombs herself, placing herself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds while  healing herself over the duration, which is increased by 0% − 100% (based on missing health) at time of cast.

1.concerningText: Frozen Tomb creates a field of ice that spreads out from the target over 1.5 seconds and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies and  slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.

Frozen Tomb creates a field of ice that spreads out from the target over 1.5 seconds and covers the surrounding area for 3 seconds, dealing magic damage to enemies and  slowing them for 0.5 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while they remain.

0.concerningText: Active: Lissandra launches a shard of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The first target hit is  slowed for 1.5 seconds.
